Component: Modal

Modal

Modals can be useful.

Modals require some basic javascript interaction, for sake of this example, we're going to use the following code:

▲ 
function modalOpen(selector) {
  document.querySelector(selector).style.display = 'block';
  setTimeout(function() {
    document.querySelector(selector).classList.add('in');
  }, 0);
}

function modalClose(selector) {
  document.querySelector(selector).style.display = 'none';
  setTimeout(function() {
    document.querySelector(selector).classList.remove('in');
  }, 0);
}
function modalOpen(selector) {
  document.querySelector(selector).style.display = 'block';
  setTimeout(function() {
    document.querySelector(selector).classList.add('in');
  }, 0);
}

function modalClose(selector) {
  document.querySelector(selector).style.display = 'none';
  setTimeout(function() {
    document.querySelector(selector).classList.remove('in');
  }, 0);
}

Modal with default styling

Modal Title

Hello World!

▲ 
<div class="modal-open">
  <div id="default" class="tsla-modal fade">
      <div class="tsla-modal--dialog">
          <div class="tsla-modal--content">
            <button class="btn-close tsla-modal--close" onClick="modalClose('#default')">&times;</button>
            <div class="tsla-modal--header">
              <h4 class="tsla-modal--title">Modal Title</h4>
            </div>
            <div class="tsla-modal--body">
              <p>Hello World!</p>
            </div>
          </div>
      </div>
  </div>
</div>

Modal with alternate styling

Hello World!

▲ 
<div class="modal-open">
  <div id="alternate" class="tsla-modal fade alternate">
    <div class="tsla-modal--dialog">
        <div class="tsla-modal--content">
          <button class="btn-close tsla-modal--close" onClick="modalClose('#alternate')">&times;</button>
          <div class="tsla-modal--body">
            <p>Hello World!</p>
          </div>
        </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

Modal with transparency

Modal Title

Hello World!

▲ 
<div class="modal-open">
  <div id="alternate-transparent" class="tsla-modal fade">
      <div class="tsla-modal--dialog">
          <div class="tsla-modal--content transparent">
            <button class="btn-close tsla-modal--close" onClick="modalClose('#alternate-transparent')">&times;</button>
            <div class="tsla-modal--header">
              <h4 class="tsla-modal--title">Modal Title</h4>
            </div>
            <div class="tsla-modal--body">
              <p>Hello World!</p>
            </div>
          </div>
      </div>
  </div>
</div>
